BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing corporations, partnerships and other business entities to obtain newsstand licenses; and to repeal section 20-241 of the administrative code of the city of New York
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing corporations, partnerships and other business entities to obtain newsstand licenses, and to repeal section 20-241 of the administrative code.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating an exception to the item pricing requirement for retail stores with scanners available for consumer use
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating an exception to the item pricing requirement for retail stores with scanners available for consumer use.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing corporations, partnerships and other business entities to obtain newsstand licenses; and to repeal section 20-241 of the administrative code of the city of New York
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Allowing corporations, partnerships and other business entities to obtain newsstand licenses, and to repeal section 20-241 of the administrative code.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing corporations, partnerships and other business entities to obtain newsstand licenses; and to repeal section 20-241 of the administrative code of the city of New York
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing corporations, partnerships and other business entities to obtain newsstand licenses, and to repeal section 20-241 of the administrative code.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing corporations, partnerships and other business entities to obtain newsstand licenses; and to repeal section 20-241 of the administrative code of the city of New York
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
